revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruby Path |image = [[File:Ruby Path.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Ruby Path. |tokens = 43,000 |location = North of Kindle Road. }} '''Ruby Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===

3,703,000 || colspan=3 |
N/A |- |}
==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 3 || 33.83% || 33.18% || 30.27% |- | {{Bag2|Rawst}} || 3 || 33.83% || 33.18% || 30.27% |- | {{Pokemon|Geodude}} || N/A || 11.28% || 11.06% || 10.09% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.29% || 14.69% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.29% || 14.69% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 3 || 32.47% || 32.47% || 32.47% |- | {{Bag2|Rawst}} || 3 || 32.47% || 32.47% || 32.47% |- | {{Pokemon|Geodude}} || N/A || 10.82% || 10.82% || 10.82% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.12% || 12.12% || 12.12% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 12.12% || 12.12% || 12.12% |}
